description: The opening match of the tournament, featuring the host nation Russia going up against Saudi Arabia. Held at the iconic Luzhniki Stadium.
A thrilling match as Brazil faces Costa Rica, showcasing some of the best talents from South America and Central America.
An intense clash between Iran and Portugal, as Portugal aims to progress in the tournament led by their star players.
A decisive group stage match between Mexico and Sweden, both looking to secure a spot in the next round.
France takes on Australia in this highly anticipated match, with France hoping to showcase their championship potential.
An exciting encounter between Croatia and Denmark, as both teams bring their unique style to the tournament stage.
